title: Are U 4 Real?
description: When Alex, a shy ballet dancer from San Francisco, meets Kyla, a beautiful girl from L.A., in a chat room, the two begin to share their innermost thoughts and feelings about their families and lives, but when friendship turns to love and the two plan to meet, Alex begins to worry what Kyla will think of him when they finally see each other face-to-face.
author: Sara Kadefors
